names.pinyin: sheng di yang yin qing re fang
names.english: rehmannia formula to nourish the yin and clear heat
names.commonEnglish: Rehmannia Formula to Nourish the Yin and Clear Heat

actions: Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
With Xuan Shen, for Kidney Yin Deficiency with Fire Blazing with soreness and swelling in the throat, dry mouth and a parched tongue.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and clears Deficiency Heat.
Tonifies Spleen Qi, nurtures Stomach Yin,moistens Lung Yin, tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Jing.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, invigorates the Blood and alleviates pain.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and drains Fire.
Opens and raises Lung Qi, directing the effects of other herbs to the upper body.
Moistens the Intestines and unblocks bowels.
Calms the Liver, benefits Yin, anchors Floating Yang and prevents the leakage of fluids.
Clears Heat, especially in the Upper Jiao, relieves toxicity and clears Blood Heat.
Resolves Summerheat, relieves thirst, clears Heat and relieves toxins.
Tonifies the Kidneys, nourishes the skin, clears Heat and relieves toxicity.

syndromes: Liver and Kidney Yin Deficiency with Fire Rising

symptoms: The lesions are few and scattered
Aching, soreness or weakness of the low back
Aching in the leg and heel
A low grade fever in the afternoon
Dry throat, maybe recurrent sore throat
